message.name: ERR_XFV_MORE_THAN_ONE_PART
message.locale: Only one %1s must be entered. Please search for a registered %1s or enter details for an unregistered %1s.

message.name: ERR_FV_CREATE_PROVIDER_DETAILS_SET_NO_NAME
message.locale: The %1s Name and Address details must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_PARTICIPANT_EMPTY
message.locale: %1s must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: Participant

message.name: ERR_FV_CREATE_PROVIDER_NAME_SET_NO_ADDRESS
message.locale: The %1s Address must be entered if the %1s Name is entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PHONE_AREA_CODE
message.locale: The Phone Area Code must be entered if the Phone Number is entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PHONE_NUMBER
message.locale: The Phone Number must be entered if the Phone Area Code is entered.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_DETAILS_MISSING
message.locale: Details of new person must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EV_OPERATION_PERMISSION_DENIED
message.locale: Not permitted to execute Dynamic Evidence Operation.

message.name: ERR_RECEIVED_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The received date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EV_EFFECTIVE_DATE_INVALID
message.locale: The effective date: %1s, is not valid for this operation.

message.name: ERR_EV_EFFECTIVE_OPTIONAL_PARENT_MISSING
message.locale: Please select one evidence record from each parent list.

message.name: ERR_EV_EFFECTIVE_MANDATORY_PARENT_MISSING
message.locale: Please select one evidence record from each parent list.

message.name: ERR_NO_ETV_FOR_DATE
message.locale: The date you have entered not valid for this evidence type.

message.name: EVIDENCEOBJECTSUMMARYTITLE
message.locale: %1c for %2s from %3s to %4s

message.name: EVIDENCEOBJECTSUMMARYTITLE_OPENENDED
message.locale: %1c for %2s from %3s

message.name: EVIDENCE_EMPTY_SUMMARY_DESC
message.locale: No Summary Description

message.name: ERR_CALCULATED_RULESET_ATTR_VALUE_MAPPING
message.locale: Cannot map value %2s to attribute %1s from calculated ruleset %3s due to type definition inconsistency.

message.name: WARN_CALCULATED_RULESET_ATTR_VALUE_EMPTY
message.locale: Cannot set attribute %1s from calculated ruleset %2s because a value of an attribute used in the calculation operation is empty.

message.name: ERR_EV_EFFECTIVE_EMPLOYMENT_ID_MISSING
message.locale: Please select one employment record from employment list.

message.name: ERR_EV_SELECTION_MISSING
message.locale: Please select one record from the following list.

message.name: ACTIVATE_EVIDENCE_MSG
message.locale: Are you sure you want to activate '%1s' effective from '%2s'?

message.name: ERR_EMPTY_CASEID
message.locale: caseID must not be zero.

message.name: CREATE_NEW_RELEMP_EVIDENCE
message.locale: Related Employment can't be empty. Please add new evidence with Related Employment
